name: shocking-mole
description: A game using Akashic Engine and Akashic Animation

scripts.export: rm -rf html && cd game && akashic export html --magnify --strip --output ../html && cd .. && akashic-atsumaru-template
scripts.export:plane: rm -rf html_plane && cd game && akashic export html --magnify --strip --output ../html_plane

author: Web Technology Corp.
